attributes.action: Ban all fireworks except registered displays
attributes.additional_details: It’s at a point where people have no consideration for others ,or animals .Some under age youths are getting hold of them . It’s use to be fireworks on the 5th November .In some communities fireworks are going off weeks before and continue to new year .
attributes.background: Ban the use of firework ,unless registered display with local council

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/319891
